widget_customization_heading_settings.section_description: (Add context to your data by applying Title and Subtitle)
widget_customization_heading_settings.saved_query_name_tooltip: Click to use as Chart Title

widget_customization_format_value_settin.section_description: (See in metric chart or series details popup, axis that presents values)
widget_customization_format_value_settin.separator: Separate groups of thousands with a comma " , "
widget_customization_format_value_settin.click_on_columns_to_select_data: Click on the columns to format the data.
widget_customization_format_value_settin.selected_columns_use_different_data_type: Selected columns use different data types.
widget_customization_format_value_settin.specify_data_type_to_apply_proper_format: Specify the data type to apply proper data formatting.
widget_customization_format_value_settin.select_multiple_columns_to_apply_formatt: Select multiple columns with the same data type to apply the same formatting.
widget_customization_format_value_settin.you_will_map_property: You will map property to the different type. Some values may not be interpreted.
widget_customization_format_value_settin.select_the_single_column_to_change_the_n: Select the single column to change the name
widget_customization_format_value_settin.use_dot_instead_of_comma: Use dot instead of comma if you want to separate decimal value

widget_customization.chart_settings_not_available: Run query and select the visualization type to see chart settings.
widget_customization.chart_settings_not_available_for_widget: There are no chart settings for the {{widget}} chart.
